metadata.name: "IMAGINE"
metadata.description: Imagine a world without art, music or poetry. "IMAGINE" is a word that inspires free thinking and creativity. The "Imagine" sculpture was conceived in my mind and brought to life through manifestation and time and patience.   It's song is a mantra for generations to come, written by one of the most prolific musical artists of our time.  Its power sends a message that anything you can imagine can become a reality. "Be grateful for your imagination as it will set you free."
